body_html:
@meteorcloudy Thanks,patch -p1 -d C:/users/liba/appdata/local/temp/_bazel_liba/mffpt2ks/external/protobuf -i D:/tensorflow-r1.2/third_party/protobuf/add_noinlines.patch --binarycan work.But how to add --binary in script？

I add --binary to workspace.bzl _apply_patch function.It seem work!Thanks again.
body_text:
@meteorcloudy Thanks,patch -p1 -d C:/users/liba/appdata/local/temp/_bazel_liba/mffpt2ks/external/protobuf -i D:/tensorflow-r1.2/third_party/protobuf/add_noinlines.patch --binarycan work.But how to add --binary in script？
I add --binary to workspace.bzl _apply_patch function.It seem work!Thanks again.
body:
@meteorcloudy Thanks,`patch -p1 -d C:/users/liba/appdata/local/temp/_bazel_liba/mffpt2ks/external/protobuf -i D:/tensorflow-r1.2/third_party/protobuf/add_noinlines.patch --binary`can work.But how to add `--binary` in script？

I add `--binary` to workspace.bzl _apply_patch function.It seem work!Thanks again.
